item.title: Zero Carb Yogurt Bread for Keto Lovers
item.description: Enjoy soft and fluffy Zero Carb Yogurt Bread, perfect for keto diets. This guilt-free bread is easy to make and delicious. Try it today!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 10 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 cup plain Greek yogurt
  • 1 cup almond flour
  • 2 large eggs
  • 1 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon salt

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a mixing bowl, combine Greek yogurt, almond flour, eggs, baking powder, and salt.
  3. Mix until well combined and a dough forms.
  4. Transfer the dough to a greased loaf pan.
  5. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden brown and a toothpick comes out clean.
  6. Let it cool before slicing.
